code: import React,{useState}from"react";import Button from"./components/ui/Button";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Calculator=()=>{const[input,setInput]=useState("");const handleClick=value=>{setInput(input+value);};const handleClear=()=>{setInput("");};const handleEqual=()=>{try{setInput(eval(input).toString());}catch(error){setInput("Error");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"calculator",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"display",children:input}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>handleClick("1"),children:"1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>handleClick("2"),children:"2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>handleClick("3"),children:"3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>handleClick("+"),children:"+"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>handleClick("4"),children:"4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>handleClick("5"),children:"5"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>handleClick("6"),children:"6"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>handleClick("-"),children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>handleClick("7"),children:"7"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>handleClick("8"),children:"8"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>handleClick("9"),children:"9"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>handleClick("*"),children:"*"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>handleClick("0"),children:"0"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:handleClear,children:"C"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:handleEqual,children:"="}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:()=>handleClick("/"),children:"/"})]})]});};export default Calculator;
